comments.body:
I didn't see `name` under series. If you mean the name under `data`, it shouldn't be placed here. https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#series-sankey.data.name .
I checked with the demo but it doesn't seem to work with tooltip.
`nodeAlign` is also not available in the doc. But I tried with the demo and it works. Maybe you should make another PR to the doc: https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts-doc
